Generate an HTML document describing a legal consulting firm called "Amicus Legal Consulting". Include sections for "Who We Are", "Our Services", "Team", and "Client Feedback". Add a "Contact Us" section at the bottom with an example email, phone number, and social media links. 

Website description: Law firm specializing in providing clear, timely, and solution-oriented legal support with a team of professionals experienced in major areas of legal practice such as Corporate law, Business law, IP law, M&A, Employment law, and Sports law.

{"html": "
  • Who we are
  • Our Services
  • Team
ARM
RUS
Timely, Accurate, Solution-oriented approach
Who we are

Amicus Legal Consulting is a dedicated team of professionals with a sound expertise in major areas of legal practice. We commit to providing clear, timely and solution-oriented legal support.  We strive to deliver results that exceed expectations.

High Quality
We address the needs of our clients with utmost effectiveness, highest standards and constant drive for excellence.
Reliability
We stand by our clients in any legal challenges they face in their business processes. You can rely on us anytime.
Individual Approach
We treat the success of our clients as our own one. Individual approach and empathy are underlying principles of our work.

Our Services

See more
Our Team
Hayk Ghazazyan
Founder & CEO

Hayk has founded our company. He is the one who has set our primary goals and values. Hayk is a legal expert with more than 17 years of professional experience, including 9 years in a KPMG, as well as in legal management of industry-leading companies.


Hayk has a sound record of legal support of complex international transactions, managing large-scale legal due diligence projects in such areas as banking, telecommunication, energy, mining. Hayk's primary areas of expertise include Corporate law, Business law, IP law, M&A, Employment law, and Sports law .


Hayk holds a PhD in Law. He is a member of the Chamber of Advocates of Armenia.

Jemma Panoyan
Ad Hoc Partner

We were thrilled when Jemma, an accomplished international lawyer, joined our team. Jemma has over 13 years of professional experience both as a legal consultant at KPMG and Deloitte in Russia and Armenia and as an in-house lawyer for major companies in both countries.


Jemmas expertise includes advising on corporate, employment, contractual, and other areas of law. Jemma has a unique work experience in the field of international education. Currently, she supports a number of educational and not-for-profit projects as a consultant. Jemma takes active initiative in supporting legislative improvements in the field of labor and educational law.

Jemma holds a master's degree in International Private Law from the Moscow State Institute of International Relations, as well as an LLM degree from the Pericles Law Center for International Legal and Business Education in Russia. She has a number of certifications in the field of child protection and legal management of educational institutions.

Clients' feedback
  • Alexey Gerasimovich
    CEO, A-Shot Games
    Throughout our partnership, the team at Amicus Legal Consulting has consistently demonstrated a highest level of expertise and dedication. The responsiveness and timely communication from Amicus team have been truly commendable. We have always felt well-informed and supported by our legal partner.
  • Sarhat Petrosyan
    Founding director, SP2 Architectural Office
    The team of Amicus lawyers, unlike many other Armenian law firms, not only transposes global corporate legal formats and norms into business relations, but also creates an individual and unique approach to each area, re-evaluating the existing standards. By working with the Amicus team we have gained a reliable partner on the legal platform and by adopting the above standards we have made their approach part of our workstyle.
  • Oksana Samoilova
    CEO, Murano AM
    We started collaborating with Amicus Legal Consulting at the very beginning of 2022. For more than a year of work, we would like to note responsibility and punctuality, and in addition, the willingness to always come to assistance in a difficult situation. All of the above, as we see it, are the main principles of the work of this law firm.
  • Marine Derdzyan
    Financial director, chain of hotels Stellar
    Amicus Legal Consulting is a reliable and competent partner for us. After contacting them you are sure that the answer is provided as a result of combination of a comprehensive analysis of legislation and best practices.
Contact Us
We enjoy talking to our clients and sharing useful information.

info@amicus.am

Asia Pacific Clinical Nutrition Society (APCNS) - A society dedicated to advancing clinical nutrition in the Asia Pacific region. It provides information about the society, recent news, publications, awards, meetings, and achievements related to clinical nutrition. It also highlights conferences, travel awards, and useful links to other nutrition-related organizations.

An agency that specializes in creating websites, applications, UX/UI designs, logotypes, branding, creatives, banners, and production. They are professionals in design and marketing, aiming to create a strong image for companies to enhance their market presence. Their portfolio includes various cases such as developing a landing page for an American recruiting company, designing an e-commerce platform for children's furniture, and creating a corporate website for a Swiss implant system. The agency also provides customer reviews and feedback.

Research Scientist specializing in AR/VR/MR, 3D User Interfaces, Human-Computer Interaction, and Machine Learning, with a portfolio of published papers and a professional history that includes positions at JPMorgan Chase & Co., Virginia Tech, Meta Reality Labs Research, and various international conferences.

{"html": "
  • Feiyu Lu / 3DI @ VT
  • Publications
  • Portfolio
  • CV

    Feiyu Lu

    Research Scientist at JPMC

    • New York, NY, USA
    • Twitter
    • Mastodon
    • Google Scholar
    • ACM
    • Youtube
    • GitHub
    • Linkedin

    About

    Hi there! Welcome to my homepage. My name is Feiyu Lu, a Research Scientist in the Global Technology Applied Research Group at JPMorgan Chase & Co. I obtained my Ph.D. degree from CS @ VT in May 2023. I am a proud member of the 3D Interaction Group directed by Prof. Doug A. Bowman and the Center for Human-Computer Interaction (CHCI) at Virginia Tech. I also worked as a Research Scientist Intern at Meta Reality Labs Research in the summer of 2021 and 2022. Prior to joining VT, I was a research assistant in X-CHI Lab led by Prof. Hai-Ning Liang . My research interests lie broadly in the intersections of Augmented/Virtual/Mixed Reality (AR/VR/MR), 3D User Interfaces (3DUI), Human-Computer Interaction (HCI), and Machine Learning (ML). I have published full papers in premiere venues such as IEEEVR, ISMAR, TVCG, and ACM CHI, SUI. I am particularly interested in:

    • Modeling and predicting user performance of 3DUIs in spatially-diverse tasks.
    • Prototyping novel, efficient, and unobtrusive input/interactions for AR/VR wearables.
    • Researching ways to provide tailored and favorable human-AI experiences in AR/VR.

    Latest News

    • One paper accepted at CHI LBW.
    • One co-authored paper accepted at IEEE TVCG.
    • Honored to be hooded by the best advisor Doug! Now officially a Dr.!
    • One paper conditionally accepted to ISMAR'23. Big shout out to collaborators from Meta Reality Labs Research!
    • Workshop papers accepted to ISMAR'23 & VIS'23.
    • One paper conditionally accepted to ACM SUI'23.
    • Successfully defended my Ph.D.! Thanks to my advisor, commmittee, mentors, and labmates!
    • Thrilled that I will be joining JPMorgan Chase & Co. as a Research Scientist!
    • Excited to be part of an amazing paper accepted at CHI'23.
    • One paper conditionally accepted at ISMAR'22 Journal Track, Singapore.
    • Started working as a Research Scientist Intern at Meta Reality Labs Research.
    • Passed my Ph.D. Prelim Proposal. Now officially a Ph.D. candidate!
    • Our team won the Best 3DUI Award at IEEEVR'22.
    • One paper conditionally accepted at ACM CHI'22, New Orleans, LA, USA. Shout out to my amazing collaborators at Reality Labs Research!
    • One paper and 3DUI contest entry conditionally accepted at IEEEVR'22, Christchurch, New Zealand.
    • Our paper won the Best Paper Honorable Mention Award at ACM SUI'21.
    • One paper accepted at ACM SUI'21.
    • Started research internship position at Facebook Reality Labs Research.
    • Our team won the Best 3DUI Award at IEEEVR'21.
    • I presented our paper at Session: Augmented Reality, IEEEVR'21.
    • One paper, DC and 3DUI entry accepted at IEEEVR'21, Lisbon, Portugal.
    • I presented our paper at Session 29: AR - Perception, IEEEVR'20.
    • Two papers and 3DUI entry published at IEEEVR'20, Atlanta, USA.
    • Passed Ph.D. Qualifier Exam.
    • One paper published at ACM SUI'19, New Orleans, USA.
    • 3DUI contest presentation at IEEEVR'19, Osaka, Japan.
    • Presented our paper at Session 8: VR/MR Experiences, ISMAR'18, Munich, Germany.
    • Joined Virginia Tech as a graduate student.
    2024 Feiyu Lu. Powered by Jekyll & AcademicPages, a fork of Minimal Mistakes.

This tool generates HTML and CSS from textual descriptions.

Miras Academy is an educational institution offering a wide range of courses and subjects aimed at preparing students for exams such as UNT. The academy provides various educational materials, including video lessons, interactive tasks, and final control tests. It emphasizes high-quality content delivered by experienced teachers, accessibility, and the use of digital technologies in education. Miras Academy also offers special preparation courses and prides itself on its professional development programs and excellent educational standards. The institution offers support through various contact methods, including email and WhatsApp, and values the importance of feedback and continuous improvement.

The service offers various repayment terms and has a dedicated customer support team.

This website is about an educational program for young individuals aged 17-25 in Yerevan, Armenia, offering leadership and development opportunities for the academic year 2023/2024. The program focuses on life skills, personal development in diverse fields such as finance, IT, and the arts, and includes various activities like workshops, seminars, and competitions to nurture talents and skills among participants.

Jusan Business is an end-to-end web and mobile application that we've building for Jusan Bank's business clients since early 2020.

Serving more than 100 000 SME's and large businesses in their daily banking operations the app was built by our team from scratch two years ago. The process included building preparing the business and tech specs, conducting rounds of UX research, producing the UI design, coming up with an effective scalable solution architecture, building the backend, web and mobile apps, deploying the app in test and production environments.

Since the roll out of the system in late 2020 we've been working on improving the existing features by working closely with the clients, building up more functionality as well as solving some technical challenges such as site reliability and scaling for an ever-growing user base.

Jusan Business is the product that our team is really proud of as we've been able to successfully launch a complex system, build up the user base solving a lot of technical and organizational challenges along the way as well as growing up the team from just 8 engineers to more than 80 people working on the project today.

Junior Bank is a mobile banking app for kids that we've been developing for Bank Centercredit since 2020.

Our team took a major role in building the product from the very beginning by conducting rounds of market research, interviews with kids and their parents, brainstorming and wireframing the user flows. Junior Bank was further built completely by our iOS and Android teams.

Today the app is loved by tens of thousands of kids in Kazakhstan, giving them a fresh and friendly interface to learn to manage their finances from early ages. It has many interesting features including online payments for games and school buses, accepting tasks from parents to request money, gamification and savings accounts for kids.

Carrying a unique value proposition for the market segment, Junior Bank is one of our projects that we are most proud of.

Next project DNA Payments

DNA Payments

  • Client

    DNA Payments

  • Year

    2020 - 2021

  • Services

    UX Research

    UI Design

    Mobile development

In 2020-2021 we have delivered three major projects for a London-based UK payment processing company DNA Payments:

1. Redesign of online payment forms
2. Redesign of Android-based POS-terminals
3. Mobile app for merchants

For online payment forms and POS-terminals we had a task of refreshing the design as well as revisiting the user flow by making it smoother and adding a few new payment options. Since every pixel on payment forms and POS terminals matters for conversion, we had to dive really deeply into analysis and work very carefully and thoroughly, double checking on every design decision that we made. Both projects included many rounds of benchmark analysis and live user tests. As a result more than 60 000 merchants across the UK with millions of daily payments have been successfully migrated to new online and offline payment processes.

We have also developed iOS and Android apps for merchants to manage their payments from smartphones. The app provides users with ability to see and filter the transactions as well as manage pending transactions and refunds. It also includes analytics in many visually appealing ways to effectively present the transactions statistics.

Next project Jusan Bank

Zipline Kapan is a travel company that organizes dream holidays and adventure activities. They offer unique experiences at breathtaking destinations, such as off-road jeeping and hiking in the highest mountain ranges like Khustup. The company boasts the longest and highest zipline in Armenia, which extends over 1750 meters. Their zipline tours offer a thrilling ride over the town, ensuring maximum safety. They also provide guided tours, including a detailed schedule for multi-day excursions and a price list for various activities.

Zipline Kapan - the longest and the highest zipline in Armenia

  • - 1750 118

eng  The total length of the zipline, which consists of two parts, is 1750 meters, the length from one point to the other is 1080 meters. This zipline is longer from the ziplines of Yenokavan (750 meters) and Yerevan (nearly 870 meters). The project engineer said this zipline differs from the other ones with its length and location as it passes over the town. In other words, the tourist will pass over the buildings.
The specialist said there is no problem with the safety. The works have been carried out at the highest level.
The zipline project is the first major investment program in Kapan in 2020. (https://armenpress.am/eng/news/1022346)
